team.name: Dustin Yellin
team.what: Brooklyn-based artist commissioned to update the Leviathan image

items.name: Initial deposit
items.description: Initial deposit of 50ETH to compensate the artist

items.name: Second payment
items.description: Second payment of 50ETH and 1 Noun NFT (Noun 252 from the Nouns treasury) upon completion of the sculpture and its accompanying NFT

items.name: Completion of Sculpture
items.description: Complete the PERSON, PLACE, or THING sculpture and its accompanying NFT

items.name: Installation
items.description: Install the sculpture in the foyer of the main dining room of Zero Bond

items.name: Exhibition
items.description: Work on additional loan placements for the sculpture at museums and relevant cultural institutions worldwide

description: Proposal for the Nouns DAO to commission the Nouns Psychogeography Sculpture by Dustin Yellin, integrating the Nouns minted in Year One into a unique glass artwork.

project.name: PERSON, PLACE, or THING
project.description: In April 2022, the Nouns DAO executed Proposal 48, commissioning artist Dustin Yellin to create a new sculptural portrait named "PERSON, PLACE, or THING." The artwork integrated 402 Nouns avatars minted in Year One into a unique glass sculpture, symbolizing the collective history and unity of the DAO. This "super-avatar" snapshot serves as a representation of the shared vision and trust among all stakeholders, exemplifying the power of individuals coming together as a community to achieve seemingly impossible tasks. The sculpture acts as a rallying banner, crystallizing the strength and potential of collective resources and talents within the Nouns DAO.

title: Dustin Yellin: PERSON, PLACE, or THING
